name: RPG Game (6tefan)
description:
A game which took me a looooong time to create. I hope you like it and I want to update it constantly.Sorry mut the story isn't still available.

Controls:

In the game:

ARROW KEYS - move

A - dash/read sign

S - attack

Z - swap weapons

ESCAPE(ESC) - enter pause menu

In the pause menu:

UP/DOWN - navigate

A - choose

xbox controller supported
